meanings.definition: The seed of the rape plant, used for oil production.
meanings.sent1: Farmers harvested rapeseeds to make cooking oil.
meanings.sent2: The field was full of golden rapeseeds ready for processing.
meanings.sent3: The rapeseeds whispered to each other, 'We will soon become delicious oil.'
meanings.sent4: The rapeseeds stood tall like tiny soldiers waiting to be pressed into oil.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh rapeseeds filled the air, promising tasty meals ahead.

meanings.sent1: In the garden, the rapeseeds plant grew rapidly under the sun.
meanings.sent2: The rapeseeds plant swayed gently in the breeze, ready to bloom.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide his acorns among the rapeseeds plant.
meanings.sent4: The rapeseeds plant danced gracefully in the wind, a golden sea of beauty.
meanings.sent5: The farmer admired the vibrant colors of the rapeseeds plant, a true marvel of nature.
